6a. 1.0 = 0x3F800000
	1.0 = 1.0 * 2^(0)
	sign = 0
	exp = 0 + 127 = 127
	mant = 0
	0|01111111|0000...
	= 0x3F800000

6b. 16.5 = 0x41840000
	16.5 = 10000.1 = 1.00001 * 2^(4)
	sign = 0
	exp = 4 + 127 = 131
	mant = 00001
	0|10000011|00001
	= 0x41840000

6c. -314.75 = 0xC39D6000
	314.75 = 100111010.11 = 1.0011101011 * 2^(8)
	sign = 1
	exp = 8 + 127 = 135
	mant = 0011101011
	1|10000111|0011101011
	= 0xC39D6000
